thought: I want to craft a stripped_spruce_wood, which requires placing a stripped_spruce_log in the crafting table. I can find a stripped_spruce_log in slot 44, so I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1
